/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. A red and white sign stands on the right side of the street, its purpose unknown but adding a pop of color to the scene. On the left side of the street, a blue umbrella stands tall, perhaps belonging to a nearby café or shop. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the vast expanse. The image is slightly blurred, giving it a dreamy quality, as if inviting the viewer to step into this tranquil setting and lose themselves in its beauty.
